block.p: Leslie Jill Kane, a daughter of Pearl R. Kane and Richard C. Kane of New York, was married on Monday to Capt. David Mark Jaffe, a son of Mary Ellen Mark of Palm Beach, Fla., and Dr. Fredrick F. Jaffe of Scarsdale, N.Y. Rabbi Steven E. Foster officiated outdoors at the Tivoli Lodge in Vail, Colo.

The bride, who is 31 and a graduate of Middlebury College, and the bridegroom, who is 29 and a graduate of Tufts University, received law degrees from Boston College. The couple live and work in Colorado. Ms. Kane, who is keeping her name, is an associate in the Boulder office of Cooley Godward, a law firm. Captain Jaffe is an assistant staff judge advocate for the 21st Space Wing at Peterson Air Force Base in Colorado Springs.

Leslie Jill Kane, a daughter of Pearl R. Kane and Richard C. Kane of New York, was married on Monday to Capt. David Mark Jaffe, a son of Mary Ellen Mark of Palm Beach, Fla., and Dr. Fredrick F. Jaffe of Scarsdale, N.Y. Rabbi Steven E. Foster officiated outdoors at the Tivoli Lodge in Vail, Colo.

The bride, who is 31 and a graduate of Middlebury College, and the bridegroom, who is 29 and a graduate of Tufts University, received law degrees from Boston College. The couple live and work in Colorado. Ms. Kane, who is keeping her name, is an associate in the Boulder office of Cooley Godward, a law firm. Captain Jaffe is an assistant staff judge advocate for the 21st Space Wing at Peterson Air Force Base in Colorado Springs.

The bride's father is the chief executive of Coverage Connect in New York, an insurance business operating on the Internet. Her mother is an associate professor at Columbia University Teachers College in New York, where she is also the director of the Klingenstein Center for Independent School Education.

The bridegroom also received a master's degree in print journalism from Boston University. His mother was until April a docent at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York. His father is an orthopedic surgeon at Beth Israel Medical Center and also has a private practice, both in New York. The bridegroom is a stepson of Dr. Deborah L. Moody.
